title: Understanding Electrophoresis
text: Electrophoresis is a technique used to separate charged molecules. Can you think of what might influence the movement of these molecules in an electric field?

title: Factors Affecting Movement
text: Consider the size and charge of the molecules. How do these factors affect their movement in an electric field?

hintAnswer: Separation of molecules based on their size and charge under an electric field
title: Principle of Electrophoresis
text: What is the main principle behind electrophoresis?
choices: Separation of molecules based on their size and charge under an electric field
Separation based on solubility in water

title: Application of Electrophoresis
text: Electrophoresis is widely used in laboratories. Can you think of some biomolecules that might be separated using this technique?

title: Biomolecules in Electrophoresis
text: Name a biomolecule that can be separated using electrophoresis.
